attributes.title: Trump
attributes.review: When I first got this app, I was in high spirits. However, my happy attitude did not last the terrorizing began when my phone was blown up with notifications from the app. Each time I tried closing the notifications, one of my pets would mysteriously disappear. When contacting the appâ€™s manager, I was replied with endless death threats of murdering my families bloodline and leaving only me to suffer. Soon, the disappearances of my pets escalated to my children. Every week, another one of my precious kids would go missing and be found at a Trump rally being beat up by confederate furries and kicked into the curb by obese babies. None of my 4 sons made it alive. After I tried deleting this cursed app, I was greeted by aggressive knocking at my door. When I opened the door, I was immediately kicked in the face by a horse. Soon this horse and its friends started to laugh at me while calling me slurs in Chinese, laughing at how my children and pets were all dead. One horse was translating the bullying for me, making me understand everything. When I starting crying they began feeding me laxatives while consistently drop kicking me back and forth while I was pooping and throwing up my guys out until I was knocked out. When I woke up I was in a basement tied up. Coming from down the stairs with a gun was none other than Ben Shapiro. He then started speaking too fast for me to understand and called me a â€œlibtardâ€ on multiple occasions (I AM A PROUD CONFEDERATE!!ğŸ˜¡ğŸ¤¬). He then shot off all my limbs, raped and impregnated me.
